item.description: Rescue; INC#2197; 09:41PM; 5900 N Vassar Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xStyWQ; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: First arriving LAFD Firefighters quickly freed the sole uninjured occupant (undetermined age/gender) trapped in a (parked?) vehicle who was briefly trapped by a 'large' fallen tree (unspecified size / species). Though there was strong storm activity in the area, LAFD does not formally determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E107 E288 E73 EM17 HR3 RA106 RA84 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#2037; 08:54PM; 2370 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Iskg8F; #HollywoodHills West; PRELIM: Energized high voltage wires down across roadway and occupied vehicle(s), with uninjured occupant(s) stranded within until the arrival of electric utility crews. Unknown ETA. Roadway closed to all vehicle traffic in the immediate area of Laurel Canyon Boulevard and Jovenita Canyon Drive. No further details. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E41; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#2008; 08:44PM; 4286 S Dalton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IQiP5w; #VermontSquare; LAFD has preceded the L.A. Dept of Building & Safety to an unknown size/species tree that has reportedly fallen onto a one-story home. No injury. Unknown visual. Though there is strong storm activity in the area, LAFD does not formally determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E215 T15; CH7; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#1230; 03:10PM; 6340 W La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IPuAce; #Tujunga; PRELIM: Solo vehicle with three adult male occupants (unknown affiliation) partially into a largely dry (only 6" storm water) narrow (4' wide) flood control channel. One of the men sustained fatal injury when he was ejected into the narrow channel, and remains at scene. Two two other men self-evacuated the vehicle prior to LAFD arrival, and later accepted ambulance transport to a regional hospital for examination of non-life threatening injuries. LAFD's Heavy Rescue unit removed the vehicle from above the flood control channel. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2387) and Coroner.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E203 E24 E274 E89 EM14 HR3 RA5 RA74 T3 T74; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#1180; 02:48PM; 8154 N Natick Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZfpUCx; #PanoramaCity; LAFD has preceded the L.A. Dept of Building & Safety to an unknown size/species tree that has reportedly fallen through the roof of a one-story home. No injury. Unknown visual. Though there is strong storm activity in the area, LAFD does not formally determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E89 E98 UR88; CH8; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0023; 12:51AM; 6669 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IoPm17; #NorthHollywood; It took 34 firefighters operating in mostly defensive mode to extinguish flames in the vacant commercial building in 24 minutes. Firefighters protected the nearby structures, without injury. Cause under investigation. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA77 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0023; 12:27AM; 6669 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IoPm17; #NorthHollywood; One-story commercial building with fire showing. Defensive mode. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA77 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1600; 09:24PM; 10328 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZmpBp7; #Chatsworth; 18 Firefighters extinguished the flames, which spread through the attached garage and attic, in 26 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E273 E28 E296 E70 RA107 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1600; 08:58PM; 10328 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZmpBp7; #Chatsworth; One-story single-family home with fire in the garage. Offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E296 RA107 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1576; 10:01PM; 13482 W Trego Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lVJe94; Sylmar; LAFD Air Operations is conducting a hoist operation for a 19yo female hiker. They will relocate her to a safe landing zone and transfer care to the ground ambulance for an evaluation. She does not appear to have any injuries at this time but was unable to safely descend the terrain. The 9-1-1 call was received at 9:11PM. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E98 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA7 RH114 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
